"@Bryon":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/542634cf6368724c6b250100#post_542634cf6368724c6b250100
Cause I was thinking of going as Utsuho, but I would have had to make the wings and arm cannon; the person doing Mokou costumes wouldn't be able to get it here in time; Byakuren's breasts are large and I can fake that; the Koishi costumes were too low in quality; if I went as Marisa people would just think "oh just a witch"; I hate exposing my armpits so that rules out Reimu; commissioning a wakasagahime costume would take way too long; I'm not even close to as muscular as Yuugi; Reisen would be good, but my hair isn't even close to as long as needed and people would just think "oh schoolgirl costume". . . etc
